properties.name: 9815 W Freiburg
properties.description: Posted by Bobthebroker 9815 W Freiburg Drive, Littleton COThis is a past clients home in Star Canyon Condominiums in Trailmark, Littleton, CO. We saw everything that was available last year and chose this one because it was brand new! In fact the building had burnt to the ground, was rebuilt and and this was the only unit for sale in the new building. It has beautiful, knotty, oak floors, a great kitchen with custom lighting, overall a great floorplan. The owner loves the area but is running off to get married!

properties.name: Diamond Ridge
properties.description: Posted by BobthebrokerDiamond Ridge Estates is a very convenient location for custom homes in a dramatic location overlooking Castle Rock. The key here is to find one of the homes on the outside of the circle. These properties have some of the best views of the front range. While most of the homes are on less than an acre there are a few large sites and even some as large as 5 acres. Most of these homes are less than 6 years old and typically have the state of the art features you expect in this price range. (00k-1.5mm)

properties.name: Elk Run
properties.description: Posted by Bobthebroker3697 Elk Run Drive Castle Rock, CO

properties.name: Keene Ranch
properties.description: Posted by BobthebrokerKeene Ranch is one of the best kept secrets for fine custom homes in a beautiful rolling hills, scrub oak setting. The home sites range from 5 acres up to mid 40\'s and are zoned agricultural as these are true horse properties. Gentle rolling hills combined with pasture/grass and some trees make for interesting topography and some fantastic settings for custom homes. This community has homes from the 00\'s all the way through million. Some common recognized flaws to the community in my opinion are: There are limited views, although I helped a family buy a nice home with excellent views of Longs Peak, the approach to the community is along the I-25 service road for a few miles before the turnoff, There are few large trees. The biggest benefits my clients have opined: Large acreage with consistently superior designed homes, rural setting, true horse property with water, low taxes compared to other top end communities.
